title: marigold_seed_broadcasting_fz03
summary: Broadcasting dried marigold seeds onto soil surface in Zone FZ-03.
description: This data unit documents the reuse of dried marigold seeds by broadcasting them onto soil in Zone FZ-03. The seeds originate from previously dried marigold flowers and are applied without chemical treatment.

reference_context.note: Seeds sourced from previously recorded marigold drying observation.

external_reference.note: External image reference for independent verification.
